payload.content: The common perception of ChatGPT 5.1 as merely 'warmer' is an oversimplification of its actual changes.

content: The common perception of ChatGPT 5.1 as merely 'warmer' is an oversimplification of its actual changes.

payload.content: ChatGPT 5.1 is the first truly agentic build model.

name: ChatGPT 5.1 is the first truly agentic build model.
content: ChatGPT 5.1 is the first truly agentic build model.

payload.content: Key advancements in ChatGPT 5.1 include enhanced instruction following (like real specs), dual brain functionality (instant vs. thinking for latency-reasoning tradeoffs), spec-driven prompting for workflows and tools, and improved reliability, verification, and judgment.

content: Key advancements in ChatGPT 5.1 include enhanced instruction following (like real specs), dual brain functionality (instant vs. thinking for latency-reasoning tradeoffs), spec-driven prompting for workflows and tools, and improved reliability, verification, and judgment.

payload.content: Teams that learn to write simple specifications and apply real judgment will outperform those treating AI as a parlor trick.

content: Teams that learn to write simple specifications and apply real judgment will outperform those treating AI as a parlor trick.
